alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 7:04AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND AFFECTING SOUTHERN SYRACUSE METRO AREA INTO MADISON COUNTY... At 7 AM, a band of lake effect snow was reintensifying south of Syracuse, stretching from near Camillus, crossing I-81 near Nedrow, and extending into southern Madison County. Webcams show visibility has dropped to near zero along I-81 in this narrow band, and roads are quickly becoming snow covered. The band will move south as an upper level disturbance moves into the area, and will further impact travel along I-81 into northern Cortland County. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
